column4: Immunizations are getting better and safer all the time as a result of medical research
Vaccines are harmful, and this fact is covered up.
Authorities promote vaccination for financial gain, not for peopleâ€™s health.
Vaccination programs are a big con.
Tiny devices are placed in vaccines to track people.
The information I receive about vaccines from the vaccine program is reliable and trustworthy.
Immunizations are always proven to be very safe before they are approved for use
New vaccines carry more risks than older vaccines
Vaccines can cause unforeseen problems in children.
I worry about the unknown effects of vaccines in the future.
Children get more shots than are good for them
It is better for children to get fewer vaccines at the same time
Vaccines may cause learning disabilities (such as autism)
The ingredients in vaccines (what vaccines are made of) are unsafe
Vaccines may cause chronic disease (such as diabetes, asthma, or immune system problems)
Vaccines are not tested enough for safety
Immunizations are one of the safest forms of medicine ever developed
Childhood vaccines are effective
I can rely on vaccines to stop serious infectious diseases
I believe that many of the illnesses shots prevent are severe
My child could get a serious disease if he or she were not vaccinated
The benefits of vaccines outweigh the risks of vaccines
Do you think that most parents like you have their children vaccinated with all the recommended vaccines?
Have you ever refused a vaccination for your child?
It is better for my child to develop immunity by getting sick than to get a shot
I have no concerns about childhood vaccines
Have you ever delayed a vaccination?
I am uncertain that climate change is really happening
It is too early to say whether climate change is really a problem
Climate change is just a natural fluctuation in earthâ€™s temperatures
I do not believe climate change is a real problem
I am certain that climate change is really happening
Claims that human activities are changing the climate are exaggerated
The seriousness of climate change is exaggerated
Floods and heat-waves are not increasing, there is just more reporting of it in the media these days
The seriousness of climate change is exaggerated in the media.
Over the past 12 months, have you punished companies that are opposing steps to reduce global warming by NOT buying their products?
Do you think global warming should be a high priority for the government?
Scientists have in the past changed their results to make climate change appear worse than it is
Climate change is a scam
The risks associated with climate change are understated
Climate change is entirely caused by human-activity
Climate change is just a result of natural variation in the climate.
The so-called "climate threat" is exaggerated.
The climate is not really changing
